last_episode_to_air.name: A Change is Gonna Come
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tao appears to tell Angela the truth. With Carole & Tuesday's first album finished, the supergroup performance is scheduled for New Year's Eve.

name: Carole & Tuesday
original_name: キャロル＆チューズデイ
overview:
Fifty years have passed since mankind began migrating to the new frontier: Mars. It's an age where most culture is produced by AI, and people are content to be passive consumers.  There's a girl. Scrapping a living in the metropolis of Alba City, she's working part time while trying to become a musician. She's always felt like something is missing. Her name is Carole.There's a girl. Born to a wealthy family in the provincial town of Herschel City, she dreams of becoming a musician, but nobody around her understands. She feels like the loneliest person in the world. Her name is Tuesday.

A chance meeting brings them together. They want to sing. They want to make music. Together, they feel like they just might have a chance. The two of them may only create a tiny wave. But that wave will eventually grow into something larger...

episodes.name: True Colors
episodes.overview: Small town girl Tuesday takes the midnight train to Alba City, leaving home for her dreams. There, she sees city girl Carole singing on a bridge.

episodes.name: Born to Run
episodes.overview: Top producer Tao begins working with Angela, who's yearned for a music career. Carole and Tuesday sneak into a concert hall to practice their song.

episodes.name: Fire and Rain
episodes.overview: With some trepidation, Carole and Tuesday agree to take Gus on as their manager. He hatches a plan to get them featured by the famous DJ Ertegun.

episodes.name: Video Killed the Radio Star
episodes.overview: Gus's next plan to get Carole and Tuesday their big break is to make a music video. He buys a weird film directing bot and asks his ex-wife for help.

episodes.name: Every Breath You Take
episodes.overview: Tuesday's brother Spencer heads to Alba City to search for her. Gus implements Plan C: gigging for exposure! Starting with a one-song gig at a bar.

episodes.name: Life is A Carnival
episodes.overview: Gus somehow gets Carole and Tuesday a gig on the main stage at a huge festival. The catch: they're a standby act for the famous, difficult Joshua.

episodes.name: Show Me the Way
episodes.overview: If new media fails, go old school! Gus gets Carole and Tuesday to try out for the amateur singing show, Mars Brightest. Tao wants Angela on it too.

episodes.name: All The Young Dudes
episodes.overview: The duo make the cut for Mars Brightest, along with Angela and a Tuesday mega-fan named Cybelle. Now they just have to perform their very best!

episodes.name: Dancing Queen
episodes.overview: Carole and Tuesday attend the Mars Brightest broadcast on their day off. Before she faces Angela, Cybelle makes a startling request of Tuesday.

episodes.name: River Deep, Mountain High
episodes.overview: The Mars Brightest semifinals begin with Ertegun as guest judge. Tao tells Angela to change her song, and Cybelle's visit raises Carole's suspicions.

episodes.name: With or Without You
episodes.overview: With Tuesday injured, she and Carole frantically try to think of a piano-only song they can perform. The attack incites recriminations backstage.

episodes.name: We've Only Just Begun
episodes.overview: It seems like all is lost, but Gus encourages Carole not to give up. With time running out before the final, they launch a rescue operation.

episodes.name: Walk This Way
episodes.overview: Carole and Tuesday are an instant sensation. But fame has its drawbacks, and they face tough choices about the next stage in their career.

episodes.name: The Kids are Alright
episodes.overview: Going indie means finding people themselves. Gus persuades the legendary and very strange Tobe to work with the duo. Angela enters the studio.

episodes.name: God Only Knows
episodes.overview: After their debut single's release, the duo get an invitation from a reclusive living legend. Tuesday's mother takes the stage for a campaign debate.

episodes.name: A Natural Woman
episodes.overview: The single charts, and Gus decides they'll play South by Southwest. On the way home from rehearsal one night they meet Carole's childhood idol, Flora.

episodes.name: Head Over Heels
episodes.overview: One morning, Ertegun wakes up bankrupt: his AI manager stole all his money and vanished. Carole and Tuesday enter the studio, but Tobe's not happy.

episodes.name: Only Love Can Break Your Heart
episodes.overview: While Ertegun and Tao squabble over her single, Angela tries to deal with a stalker. Tuesday meets with Kyle as her mother's campaign heats up.

episodes.name: People Get Ready
episodes.overview: Tao offers to track down Angela's stalker once Dahlia tells him all about it. Things come to a head as Angela takes the stage at the Cydonia Festival.

episodes.name: Immigrant Song
episodes.overview: Carole and Tuesday start rehearsing for their performance as Mars Grammy nominees. Tao runs afoul of the law just as Angela's replica is completed.

episodes.name: It's Too Late
episodes.overview: With Tao arrested and her mother hospitalized, Angela is all alone. Carole and Tuesday struggle to come up with a song to close their album.

episodes.name: Just Like Heaven
episodes.overview: A suggestion from Crystal inspires the duo to write a new song for their Grammys performance. Dahlia's condition puts Angela's attendance in doubt.

episodes.name: Don't Stop Believin'
episodes.overview: After Skip gets arrested, the duo and their industry colleagues decide to create a supergroup song opposing Valerie's policies. Tao is still at large.

episodes.name: A Change is Gonna Come
episodes.overview: Tao appears to tell Angela the truth. With Carole & Tuesday's first album finished, the supergroup performance is scheduled for New Year's Eve.
